mapper.select:
select * from hotel where status = "Y"
and consumer_id = #{id}

select p.*, h.name as hotelName from produce p ,hotel h where p.hotel_id = h.hotel_id and p.status = 'Y' and p.hotel_id in (select hotel.hotel_id from consumer,hotel where consumer.id = hotel.consumer_id and hotel.status = 'Y'
and consumer_id = #{id} )

select h.hotel_id as "hotel_id", h.name as "hotel_name", h.address as "hotel_address", h.picture as "hotel_picture", h.grade as "hotel_grade", min(p.price) as "min_price" from hotel h, produce p where h.hotel_id = p.hotel_id and p.status = "Y" group by h.hotel_id

select h.hotel_id as hotel_id, h.name as hotel_name, h.address hotel_address, h.star as hotel_star, h.phone as hotel_phone, h.flag as hotel_fag, h.picture as hotel_picture, h.grade as hotel_grade, p.produce_id as pro_id, p.houseType as pro_houseType, p.bedType as pro_bedType, p.picture as pro_picture, p.price as pro_price, p.flag as pro_flag, pt.restAmount as pt_restAmount from hotel h, produce p,produce_time pt where h.hotel_id = p.hotel_id and p.produce_id = pt.produce_id and h.hotel_id = #{hotel_id} and pt.startDate = '2018-04-17' and pt.endDate = '2018-04-18' and p.status = 'Y'
